name: AKUMA Sword
description:
A simple 2D platformer in the Japanese setting, where You are playing as a samurai demon hunter named Kenshin and his henchman demon named Akuma, who was in a legendary sword, You need to find the sword broken by THE MEGA EVIL DEMON into 5 parts. Your henchman demon was forced to enter the wooden sword, and only he can repair the broken sword. 

Made By Team CHIPSOED / Alexander Pak 

Gameplay
  • You need to run to the end of the level and get the part of the sword. If you fall behind the map, the level will restart, so be CAREFUL when jumping between platforms. In addition, you have 5 lives against Demons, when the counter reaches zero, the level also starts over.
  • Your main enemy and obstacle is the evil Demons on the level.
  • Available to the player:
    1. A/D - Move
    2. SpaceBar - Jump
    3. Destroy Demons by jumping on their heads
  • As you progress through the game, the level becomes more difficult. As you can see in the game itself, at first you are given a tutorial where the player can get used to the controls and also there is only one Demon on the way.

Addition

The visual style is certainly not quite Japanese. This is due to the fact that I was alone in the team and I didn’t really want to draw everything by hand, as this is a very labor-intensive process in terms of time and effort. So I took the Game Assets from the Unity Asset Store.  At least the main character is a bit like a Japanese-style Samurai.  The game also lacks many of the mechanics that I thought they would at the time of design and development. Such as combat, moving platforms. This can be attributed to inexperience in creating games. Despite the excuses I've written here, I hope you enjoy playing AKUMA Sword at least a little bit. 

Best Regards CHIPSOED Team :)
